body:
Excuse me, but so where's been the Volume 1 of Ero Mizugi Anthology Comics - Erotic Swimwear Anthology Comics (エロ水着 アンソロジーコミックス) anyways, please?

So then, who could go translate and upload both of them into English/Chinese Traditional Versions over there asap, please?

Once again, thank you so much indeed! Amen!
